articles.title: Trouble in Gretzkyville: For the first time, The Great One finds himself shunned by hometown fans
articles.description: Edmonton’s deep connection and allegiance to Wayne Gretzky endured for decades, but his close friendship to Donald Trump has lifelong fans calling him a disgrace

articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.title: Minerals deal off as Trump, Zelenskyy talks end in shouting match
articles.description: WASHINGTON, United States — US President Donald Trump erupted at Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Friday, angrily sending the Ukrainian leader out of the White House after an extraordinary Oval Office meltdown because he was 'not ready' for peace with Russia.
articles.content:

articles.author: The Globe and Mail
articles.title: Trump administration approves nearly $3-billion arms sale to Israel
articles.description: State Department announces sale of bombs, warheads worth $2.04-billion as part of deal
articles.content:
The Trump administration has approved an arms sale worth nearly $3-billion to Israel, bypassing a normal congressional review to provide the country with more of the 2,000-pound bombs that it has used in the war against Hamas in Gaza.

articles.title: Gretzky super fan, memorabilia market undeterred by outrage over Trump connection
articles.description: EDMONTON — Hockey legend Wayne Gretzky might be in the penalty box in the minds of many Canadians right now, but one Alberta-based superfan says his admiration for the Great One remains intact.
articles.content:
EDMONTON — Hockey legend Wayne Gretzky might be in the penalty box in the minds of many Canadians right now, but one Alberta-based superfan says his admiration for the Great One remains intact.
